parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To go forward, go on, advance; I go before, precede. From pro and erchomai; to go onward, precede.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Troas, a harbor city of Mysia. From Tros; the Troad, i.e. Troas, a place in Asia Minor.
